Mission Orders

Killian's minions are assembling in the Crypt.

Kill {@LinkCreature:37#230#chaotic tyraks}, {@LinkCreature:37#220#eldritch reapers}, {@LinkCreature:37#240#naroder arachnens}, {@LinkCreature:37#250#infernal imps}, and {@LinkCreature:37#270#capricious ebon imps}.

Report to Coordinator Taira when mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
